  • Method Details

    • getMeteorites

      public List<String> getMeteorites()

    • checkCannonsForMeteorCoverage

      public boolean checkCannonsForMeteorCoverage(Player currentPlayer, int roll, ComponentSide side, ComponentType cannonType, int meteor)
      returns if cannons are present in the specified row or column
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player whose board we are checking
      roll - the row/column that is being attacked
      side - from which side the meteor is arriving
      cannonType - the type of cannon we're checking for
      meteor - from which direction the meteor is arriving: for front facing meteor we only check the direct column, for side and back facing meteor we check the direct and adjacent columns/rows
      Returns:
      true if there are cannons that can stop the meteor, false if there aren't
